metadata.title: CVE-2023-37369 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: In Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.x through 6.5.x before6.5.2, there can be an application crash in QXmlStreamReader via a craftedXML string that triggers a situation in which a prefix is greater than alength.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
